message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $140 to start. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $140 is a bit high for me.  I'd be willing to pay $125.  What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
